metadata.name: Influence
metadata.description:
digital painting + mixed media  | 2023-indefinite

This work is currently comprised of 11,400 marks to reflect each of my followers on Twitter. [03.22.23]

Influence will change over time to reflect my Twitter following as it grows (or stagnates or shrinks).  I plan to manually update the metadata (image + text) at least twice a year until my death or the death of Twitter. 

(Unless Sold) The price of Influence will also change by increasing (or decreasing) by 1 ETH for every 1k followers that I gain (or lose) over time. 

All aspects of Influence (image iterations + concept) are CC0.
